    font-size: 2.25rem;

    width: 30rem;

    height: 14.1rem;
  }
  #blueBg #service #service-blocks #service-block1 .appFrame figure:hover .appHover, #blueBg #service #service-blocks #service-block1 .appFrame figure .appHover, #blueBg #service #service-blocks #service-block2 .appFrame figure:hover .appHover, #blueBg #service #service-blocks #service-block2 .appFrame figure .appHover, #blueBg #service #service-blocks #service-block3 .appFrame figure:hover .appHover, #blueBg #service #service-blocks #service-block3 .appFrame figure .appHover, #blueBg #service #service-blocks #service-block4 .appFrame figure:hover .appHover, #blueBg #service #service-blocks #service-block4 .appFrame figure .appHover {
    width: 25rem;
    height: 14.1rem;
    padding: 0.25rem 0rem;
  }
  #project #project-blocks .project-block:nth-child(1) {
    width: 100%;
    margin: 1.5rem auto;
  }
  #project #project-blocks .project-block:nth-child(2) {
    width: 100%;
    margin: 1.5rem auto;
  }
  #project #project-blocks .project-block:nth-child(3) {
    width: 100%;
    margin: 1.5rem auto;

    width: 100%;

  #project #project-blocks .project-block:nth-child(5) {
    width: 100%;
    margin: 1.5rem auto;
  }
  #project #project-blocks .project-block:nth-child(6) {
    width: 100%;
    margin: 1.5rem auto;
  }

    width: 100%;

    text-align: center;
  }
  #contact .center-block #contactMe #contactIcons .contactIcon p i {
    width: 100%;
    font-size: 2rem;
    margin-bottom: 0.7rem;
  }
  #contact .center-block #contactForm form .formRow input[type='text'], #contact .center-block #contactForm form .formRow input[type='email'], #contact .center-block #contactForm form .formRow textarea {
    width: 90%;

  }

    left: 1.1rem;
  }

    width: 100%;
    height: 22rem;
  }
  @-webkit-keyframes floatImage {
    0% {
      -webkit-transform: translateY(-1.5rem) translateX(1.8rem);
              transform: translateY(-1.5rem) translateX(1.8rem);
    }
    50% {
      -webkit-transform: translateY(0.5rem) translateX(0.5rem);
              transform: translateY(0.5rem) translateX(0.5rem);
    }
    100% {
      -webkit-transform: translateY(-1.5rem) translateX(1.8rem);
              transform: translateY(-1.5rem) translateX(1.8rem);
    }
  }
  @keyframes floatImage {
    0% {
      -webkit-transform: translateY(-1.5rem) translateX(1.8rem);
              transform: translateY(-1.5rem) translateX(1.8rem);
    }
    50% {
      -webkit-transform: translateY(0.5rem) translateX(0.5rem);
              transform: translateY(0.5rem) translateX(0.5rem);
    }
    100% {
      -webkit-transform: translateY(-1.5rem) translateX(1.8rem);
              transform: translateY(-1.5rem) translateX(1.8rem);
    }
  }
  #blueBg #service #service-blocks #service-block1 .appFrame, #blueBg #service #service-blocks #service-block2 .appFrame, #blueBg #service #service-blocks #service-block3 .appFrame, #blueBg #service #service-blocks #service-block4 .appFrame {
    width: 25rem;
    height: 15.5rem;
  }

    width: 21rem;
  }
  #blueBg #service #service-blocks #service-block1 .appFrame figure img, #blueBg #service #service-blocks #service-block2 .appFrame figure img, #blueBg #service #service-blocks #service-block3 .appFrame figure img, #blueBg #service #service-blocks #service-block4 .appFrame figure img {
    height: 13.1rem;
  }
  #blueBg #service #service-blocks #service-block1 .appFrame figure:hover .appHover, #blueBg #service #service-blocks #service-block1 .appFrame figure .appHover, #blueBg #service #service-blocks #service-block2 .appFrame figure:hover .appHover, #blueBg #service #service-blocks #service-block2 .appFrame figure .appHover, #blueBg #service #service-blocks #service-block3 .appFrame figure:hover .appHover, #blueBg #service #service-blocks #service-block3 .appFrame figure .appHover, #blueBg #service #service-blocks #service-block4 .appFrame figure:hover .appHover, #blueBg #service #service-blocks #service-block4 .appFrame figure .appHover {
    width: 21rem;
  }

    width: 25rem;
    height: 15.5rem;
  }
  #project #project-blocks .project-block:nth-child(2) .appFrame .appHeader {
    width: 20rem;
  }
  #project #project-blocks .project-block:nth-child(2) .appFrame figure {
    width: 21rem;
  }
  #project #project-blocks .project-block:nth-child(2) .appFrame figure img {
    height: 13.1rem;
  }
  #project #project-blocks .project-block:nth-child(2) .appFrame figure:hover .appHover {
    width: 21rem;
    height: 13.1rem;
    padding: 1.5rem 0rem;
  }
  #project #project-blocks .project-block:nth-child(3) .appFrame {
    width: 25rem;
    height: 15.5rem;
  }
  #project #project-blocks .project-block:nth-child(3) .appFrame .appHeader {
    width: 20rem;
  }
  #project #project-blocks .project-block:nth-child(3) .appFrame figure {
    width: 21rem;
  }
  #project #project-blocks .project-block:nth-child(3) .appFrame figure img {
    height: 13.1rem;
  }
  #project #project-blocks .project-block:nth-child(3) .appFrame figure:hover .appHover {
    width: 21rem;
    height: 13.1rem;
    padding: 1.5rem 0rem;
  }
  #project #project-blocks .project-block:nth-child(4) .appFrame {
    width: 25rem;
    height: 15.5rem;
  }
  #project #project-blocks .project-block:nth-child(4) .appFrame .appHeader {
    width: 20rem;
  }
  #project #project-blocks .project-block:nth-child(4) .appFrame figure {
    width: 21rem;
  }
  #project #project-blocks .project-block:nth-child(4) .appFrame figure img {
    height: 13.1rem;
  }
  #project #project-blocks .project-block:nth-child(4) .appFrame figure:hover .appHover {
    width: 21rem;
    height: 13.1rem;
    padding: 1.5rem 0rem;
  }
  #project #project-blocks .project-block:nth-child(5) .appFrame {
    width: 25rem;
    height: 15.5rem;
  }
  #project #project-blocks .project-block:nth-child(5) .appFrame .appHeader {
    width: 20rem;
  }
  #project #project-blocks .project-block:nth-child(5) .appFrame figure {
    width: 21rem;
  }
  #project #project-blocks .project-block:nth-child(5) .appFrame figure img {
    height: 13.1rem;
  }
  #project #project-blocks .project-block:nth-child(5) .appFrame figure:hover .appHover {
    width: 21rem;
    height: 13.1rem;
    padding: 1.5rem 0rem;
  }
  #project #project-blocks .project-block:nth-child(6) .appFrame {
    width: 25rem;
    height: 15.5rem;
  }
  #project #project-blocks .project-block:nth-child(6) .appFrame .appHeader {
    width: 20rem;
  }
  #project #project-blocks .project-block:nth-child(6) .appFrame figure {
    width: 21rem;
  }
  #project #project-blocks .project-block:nth-child(6) .appFrame figure img {
    height: 13.1rem;
  }
  #project #project-blocks .project-block:nth-child(6) .appFrame figure:hover .appHover {
    width: 21rem;
    height: 13.1rem;
    padding: 1.5rem 0rem;
  }
  #project #project-blocks .project-block:nth-child(6) .appFrame figure:hover .appHover, #project #project-blocks .project-block:nth-child(6) .appFrame figure .appHover {
    width: 21rem;
    height: 13.1rem;
    padding: 5.5rem 0rem;
  }
}

@media screen and (max-width: 320px) {
  html {
    font-size: 0.74em;
  }
  .center-block {
    width: 95%;
  }
  .button {
    padding: 1.5rem 2.8rem;
  }
  #cover #cover-content #mainPhoto-block article img {
    width: 16.5rem;
  }
  #cover #cover-content #mainPhoto-block article:last-child {
    height: 77.2%;
  }
  #aboutMe #about-region > .about-block {
    width: 95%;
  }

    font-size: 6.3rem;
    line-height: 6.3rem;
  }
